       # File railties/lib/rails/generators/rails/app/app_generator.rb, line 113
113:     def javascripts
114:       unless options[:skip_prototype]
115:         directory "public/javascripts"
116:       else

92: 
93:       inside "log" do
94:         %( server production development test ).each do |file|
95:           create_file "#{file}.log"

97:         end
98:       end
